item.title: Custom Excerpt More and Custom Excerpt More Link in WordPress
item.description: Before talking about the custom excerpt more in WordPress let’s talk about the general meaning of the excerpt. It means a short extract from anything. So when it comes to the WordPress, excerpt means _a short extract from the blog post. _Excerpt in the blog is one of the important thing that every WordPress user uses it for the customisation.
